name: dcache.dcache
description: dCache provides system for storing and retrieving huge amounts of data, distributed among a large number of heterogenous server nodes, under a single virtual filesystem tree with a variety of standard access methods.
changeLog: This is a major upgrade fro dCache from 2.6 to 2.10. Please have a look for details at: http://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-2.10.shtml#24
